title: The Merge: Proof of Stake
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Merge: Proof of Stake.

hook.text: In September 2022, Ethereum switched off mining forever. It was the biggest upgrade in blockchain history.

discovery.text: The Merge cut Ethereum's energy use by 99.95%. It went from consuming as much as a country to as much as a village.

twist.text: Miners who spent millions on hardware were suddenly obsolete. Some moved to Ethereum Classic to keep mining.

climax.text: The Merge happened without a single second of downtime. A live billion-dollar system swapped its engine mid-flight.

punchline.text: Ethereum changed its engine while flying. Nothing broke.

quiz.question: What did The Merge accomplish?
options: Switched from proof of work to proof of stake, cutting energy 99.95%
